name: Mothership Mayhem
description:
Mothership Mayhem is a FPS - roguelite that revolves around modding your guns based on randomized drops.

This is mostly an unpolished output that at least has the general design goals accomplished.

Mothership Mayhem was developed as accomplishment for our IEPROJ course (2020 - 2021) series in De La Salle University.

My contributions:

  • Lead Designer
  • UI Programming (HUD, Mod Store, Modding Guns, Main Menu)
  • Gameplay Programmer (Game Loop, Game Modes)
  • Gun Particle FX
  • Level and Environment Designer
